publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1741 Mr Gil Paterson: Planning Permission for Telecommunications Mastsâ€”That the Parliament is concerned about the number of telecommunications masts being erected across the country and the locations they are being erected in; is aware that the presence of these masts causes much concern to the people living and working in these areas, and urges the Scottish Executive to give powers to local authorities to enforce planning regulations on all applications for telecommunications masts.
